title: Pantene Pro-V Logotype
content:
Does anyone know what typeface the new Pantene wordmark is based off of?

I can post a better picture, if it helps.

Thanks, Sam

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Pantene.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823212448/http:/typophile.com/files/Pantene.jpg) | 17.48 KB |
author: Sam Serif

comments.content: Not sure but looks like custom from [Adobe Friz Quadrata](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823212448/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/friz-quadrata/regular/)...
Image posted now ... sorry for the delay. Friz Quadrata looks very promising. Thank god there are no lowercase a's in Pantene.
